summary: Neurotic businessman must find the right man for his pregnant daughter. In fact, it is little bit complicated.
cast: Louis de Funès|Claude Rich|Mario David|Germaine Delbat|Claude Gensac|Agathe Natanson|Dominique Page|Paul Préboist|Sylvia Saurel|Philippe Vallauris|Roger Van Hool
title: Una maleta, dos maletas, tres maletas
